content: I think I'll offer a loyalty program that rewards customers for repeat purchases, and combine it with an email list sign-up. I'll set up a sign-up sheet at the Foodie Fest and offer a discount or incentive for customers who sign up on the spot. I'll also train my staff to promote the loyalty program and email list sign-up to customers. Do you think I should also consider offering a free gift or a free shipping option for customers who spend a certain amount or reach a certain loyalty tier?
